00045 class SIM_API cParImpl : public cNamedObject
00046 {
00047   protected:
00048     // various flags, stored in cNamedObject::flags
00049     enum {
00050       FL_ISVOLATILE = 4,  // whether it was declared as "volatile" in NED
00051       FL_ISEXPR = 8,      // whether it stores a constant or an expression
00052       FL_ISSHARED = 16,   // used by cPar only: whether this object is shared among multiple cPars
00053       FL_CONTAINSVALUE = 32, // whether it has a value
00054       FL_ISSET = 64       // whether the contained value is just a default value (false) or the set value (true)
00055     };
00056 
00057   private:
00058     // unit (s, mW, GHz, baud, etc); optional
00059     const char *unitp; // stringpooled
00060 
00061     // global variables for statistics
00062     static long total_parimpl_objs;
00063     static long live_parimpl_objs;
00064     static cStringPool unitStringPool;
00065 
00066   private:
00067     void copy(const cParImpl& other);
00068 
00069   public:
00070     typedef cPar::Type Type;
00071 
00072   public:
00075 
00079     explicit cParImpl();
00080 
00084     cParImpl(const cParImpl& other) : cNamedObject(other) {unitp = NULL; copy(other);}
00085 
00089     virtual ~cParImpl();
00090 
00094     cParImpl& operator=(const cParImpl& otherpar);
00096 
00103     virtual std::string info() const;
00104 
00108     virtual std::string detailedInfo() const;
00109 
00113     virtual cParImpl *dup() const;
00114 
00118     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00119 
00123     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00125 
00131     virtual Type getType() const = 0;
00132 
00136     virtual bool isNumeric() const = 0;
00137 
00141     virtual bool isVolatile() const {return flags & FL_ISVOLATILE;}
00142 
00148     virtual bool isExpression() const {return flags & FL_ISEXPR;}
00149 
00153     virtual bool isShared() const {return flags & FL_ISSHARED;}
00154 
00159     virtual bool containsValue() const  {return flags & FL_CONTAINSVALUE;}
00160 
00166     virtual bool isSet() const {return flags & FL_ISSET;}
00167 
00172     virtual void setIsVolatile(bool f) {setFlag(FL_ISVOLATILE,f);}
00173 
00177     virtual void setIsShared(bool f) {setFlag(FL_ISSHARED,f);}
00178 
00182     virtual void setIsSet(bool f) {setFlag(FL_ISSET,f);}
00183 
00189     virtual const char *getUnit() const;
00190 
00194     virtual void setUnit(const char *s);
00196 
00199 
00203     virtual void setBoolValue(bool b) = 0;
00204 
00208     virtual void setLongValue(long l) = 0;
00209 
00213     virtual void setDoubleValue(double d) = 0;
00214 
00220     virtual void setStringValue(const char *s) = 0;
00221 
00225     virtual void setStringValue(const std::string& s)  {setStringValue(s.c_str());}
00226 
00230     virtual void setXMLValue(cXMLElement *node) = 0;
00231 
00240     virtual void setExpression(cExpression *e) = 0;
00242 
00245 
00249     virtual bool boolValue(cComponent *context) const = 0;
00250 
00254     virtual long longValue(cComponent *context) const = 0;
00255 
00259     virtual double doubleValue(cComponent *context) const = 0;
00260 
00269     virtual const char *stringValue(cComponent *context) const = 0;
00270 
00274     virtual std::string stdstringValue(cComponent *context) const = 0;
00275 
00279     virtual cXMLElement *xmlValue(cComponent *context) const = 0;
00280 
00284     virtual cExpression *getExpression() const = 0;
00286 
00289 
00294     virtual void convertToConst(cComponent *context) = 0;
00295 
00299     virtual bool containsConstSubexpressions() const;
00300 
00305     virtual void evaluateConstSubexpressions(cComponent *context);
00306 
00310     virtual std::string str() const = 0;
00311 
00317     virtual void parse(const char *text) = 0;
00318 
00322     static cParImpl *createWithType(Type type);
00324 
00327 
00332     virtual int compare(const cParImpl *other) const;
00334 
00344     static long getTotalParImplObjectCount() {return total_parimpl_objs;}
00345 
00352     static long getLiveParImplObjectCount() {return live_parimpl_objs;}
00353 
00358     static void resetParImplObjectCounters()  {total_parimpl_objs=live_parimpl_objs=0L;}
00360 };
